heading: Monthly Call - November
description: The view of the earth from the moon fascinated me - a small disk, 240,000 miles away.

heading: Backlogs and why every website needs one
description: I'm convinced that some wayward stranger in a space-craft, coming from some other part of the heavens, could look at earth and never know that it was inhabited at all.

heading: Cultivating a dynamic career in UX
description: We are one hunk of ground, water, air, clouds, floating around in space. From out there it really is 'one world'.

heading: Supporting inclusive language through automation
description: The Earth is the only world known so far to harbor life. There is nowhere else, at least in the near future, to which our species could migrate. Visit, yes. Settle, not yet. Like it or not, for the moment the Earth is where we make our stand.
